meanings: to succeed (someone in a post, role, etc.)

related.meaning: to succeed (a person, to a position, etc.)

lessons.japanese: トラは空腹の時は人を襲うものだ。
lessons.english: A tiger will attack people when it is hungry.

lessons.japanese: いつ私たちを襲うかもしれない。
lessons.english: It could attack us at any moment.

lessons.japanese: 下手に手を動かすと気付かれてしまうという強迫観念が俺を襲う。
lessons.english: I was assailed by the stupid, but unshakeable, idea that if I was imprudent enough to move my hand I'd be noticed.

lessons.japanese: 毎年今頃、台風がその島を襲う。

lessons.japanese: 秋にはいくつかの台風が日本を襲う。
